column6:
The climactic battle - will the combined might of the Earth's two greatest super hero families be enough to save Manhattan - and the world - from total annihilation? The X-Men and FF do their final face-off against the alien Brood!,2005,4
32 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$3.50
